From: "Tom Tildrum" <Tevildo@...>

I'm active in Gladiator still, just not very. I have plans for more stuff, 
but right now there are other games occupying my time. Plus school... plus 
theatre... Tevildo is a busy boy. Who just got a girlfriend... : )  Tevildo 
is a HAPPY boy.

Anyway, I keep my game site updated, so you can always see what my latest 
projects are. I've been working with emulation a bit, but you can see that 
for yourself... anyone else out there make Warcraft II scenarios? I'd like 
to see some for comparison... I only know of two people who do both 
Gladiator and Warcraft, and it seems that these people tend to concentrate 
on the combat (i.e. Gladiator-ish) elements of their Warcraft levels more 
than the economy. Anyway, the site is http://uk.geocities.com/tevgames. I'd 
be glad to trade links with people...

     -All your base are belong to Tevildo.
